articles.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
articles.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

articles.title: Betterment urges users to ignore ‘unauthorized’ crypto promotion message
articles.description: The message claimed Betterment would “triple” Bitcoin and Ether deposits sent within hours, urging users to transfer $10,000 to crypto wallets.

articles.title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs lose $681M in first week of 2026 as risk appetite fades
articles.description: Spot Bitcoin ETFs reversed early inflows in 2026 and posted four straight days of outflows as fading rate-cut hopes and rising geopolitical risks pushed investors into risk-off positioning.

articles.title: Pump.fun says creator fees ‘may have skewed’ incentives, plans revamp
articles.description: Pump.fun is introducing a new creator fee sharing system that lets teams and CTO admins split fees across up to 10 wallets, transfer coin ownership and revoke update authority.

articles.title: Anti-DeFi group runs ads urging public to pressure Senators on crypto bill: Report
articles.description: A series of ads reportedly aired on Fox News, calling on the public to contact their senators to remove DeFi provisions from the CLARITY Act bill.

articles.title: Asset manager VanEck explains how one bitcoin could be worth $2.9 million by 2050
articles.description: The asset manager’s base case assumes bitcoin gains traction as a settlement tool and reserve asset over the next 25 years.

articles.title: A16z raises $15B, says crypto a 'key' to America winning next 100 years
articles.description: Crypto remains a key technology for maintaining America’s technological edge, according to a16z, which has raised another $15 billion to back American-aligned tech investments.

articles.title: A16z Crypto Shares Three Crypto Predictions for 2026
Stablecoin card adoption will be a 'big theme' of 2026: Dragonfly exec
articles.description: Crypto venture capitalists have tipped stablecoin card adoption to take off in 2026 after fintech startup Rain secured $250 million in funding to push stablecoin payments.

articles.title: Memecoin Market Cratered More Than 60% in 2025: Report
Bitcoin tests key support as bulls reset to prepare for futures-led rally to $101.5K
articles.description: Bitcoin traders’ risk sentiment turned bullish, with the proof being in this week’s futures-led advance to $95,000. Will bulls make another attempt after retesting a key underlying support level?

articles.title: Bitcoin Whales Keep Buying as 100+ BTC Addresses Set New Record
articles.description:
Bitcoin Magazine

articles.title: Nasdaq, CME Group join forces to launch Nasdaq-CME Crypto Index
articles.description: Cryptocurrency index benchmarks and crypto index investment vehicles will grow in popularity as market complexity increases, analysts say.

articles.title: Should Politicians Be Able to Use Prediction Markets? House Bill Proposes Ban
articles.description: Rep. Ritchie Torres introduced legislation to ban government officials from prediction markets, citing insider information concerns.

articles.title: Colombia advances crypto tax rules as global reporting standards take shape
articles.description: New rules from Colombia’s tax authority require crypto service providers to collect and share user and transaction data.

articles.title: Senate Republicans race toward crypto vote on bill with uncertain Democratic buy-in
articles.description: The Banking Committee chief confirmed Friday evening that he's pressing forward, though the Agriculture Committee says it still hopes for a bipartisan version.

articles.title: US lawmakers demand ethics safeguards for market structure bill: Report
articles.description: Democratic leaders on key committees considering crypto market structure legislation are reportedly drawing a line in the sand over elected officials profiting off the industry.

articles.title: Wall Street’s crypto debate is over as banks go all-in on BTC, stablecoins, tokenized cash
articles.description: Big banks aren’t debating crypto anymore — they’re building it. From tokenized cash to ETFs, Wall Street is quietly going onchain.

articles.title: Insiders Say DeepSeek V4 Will Beat Claude and ChatGPT at Coding, Launch Within Weeks
articles.description: DeepSeek's upcoming V4 model could outperform Claude and ChatGPT in coding tasks, according to insiders—with its purported release nearing.

articles.title: 'Baldur's Gate 3' Game Studio Says 'Divinity' Won't Include AI-Generated Art
articles.description: Larian Studios head Swen Vincke said the upcoming RPG Divinity will not use generative AI art, though the studio still sees benefits to the tech.

articles.title: CLARITY Act hinges on bipartisan support, and here are the numbers: Analyst
articles.description: The crypto market structure bill is unlikely to come up for a second vote in 2026 if it fails to pass in a vote next week, analyst Alex Thorn said.

articles.title: Bitcoin Price Could Surge to $53 Million by 2050, Says VanEck—Here's Why
articles.description: Could Bitcoin be worth more than $50 million per coin in 24 years? VanEck just put out its most bullish price prediction yet.

articles.title: Bitcoin pulls back to $90,000 as early Friday rally attempt fails
articles.description: U.S. employment data for December was mixed, while inflation expectations edged higher, and the U.S. Supreme Court did not deliver a ruling on the Trump Administration's tariffs.

articles.title: Crypto crowd could still walk away from U.S. market structure bill if DeFi needs unmet
articles.description: There are red-line demands from decentralized finance — and backed by the rest of crypto — that remain unknowns as senators finish the draft they'll vote on.

articles.title: Crypto Markets Edge Lower After US Jobs Miss Expectations
US lawmaker's bill would ban politically related prediction bets after Maduro wager
articles.description: The bill came after a Polymarket user netted more than $400,000 on a contract related to the removal of then-Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro, fueling concerns about insider trading.

articles.title: Trading bots gain traction as crypto markets move sideways: HTX 2025 recap
articles.description: The cryptocurrency exchange reported sharp growth in automated trading as volatility narrowed across major crypto assets.

articles.title: World's largest custodial bank BNY to offer tokenized deposits for institutional investors
articles.description: The initiative mirrors deposit balances on a private blockchain to speed up settlement and unlock liquidity.

articles.title: Pump.fun overhauls creator fees as token launches hit highest daily count since September
articles.description: Pump.fun says creator fees worked for organized project teams but had little impact on typical memecoin deployers.

articles.title: Bitcoin holds $90K as ETFs wobble and institutions reposition: Finance Redefined
articles.description: Bitcoin steadied near $90,000 as ETF flows turned negative, altcoins continued a valuation reset and DeFi markets showed pockets of renewed activity.

articles.title: The Daily: Cathie Wood says US government may soon start buying bitcoin, Ripple secures FCA authorization, and more
articles.description: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

articles.title: Truebit Hack Wipes Out TRU in First Major Exploit of 2026

articles.description: Long-term Bitcoin holders sold nearly $300 billion worth of BTC in 2025, but as this sell pressure declines, a bullish outlook for 2026 has emerged.

articles.title: Crypto VC Giant Andreessen Horowitz Raises $15 Billion to Help America 'Win' Tech Race
articles.description: Major crypto investor Andreessen Horowitz raised $15 billion across multiple funds to propel technology bets and help boost America's prospects.

articles.title: BNY Debuts Tokenized Deposits for Institutions and 'Digital Natives'
articles.description: BNY, the world’s largest custodian bank, signaled that it will begin issuing digital representations of customers’ deposits on the blockchain.

articles.title: Price predictions 1/9: BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, DOGE, ADA, BCH, LINK, HYPE
articles.description: Buyers are attempting to defend the near-term support in Bitcoin and select major altcoins, but the bears have not given up and continue to exert pressure near the intraday range highs.

articles.title: ZEC Rebounds 11%! Trump says he won’t pardon Sam Bankman-Fried! Florida revisits it’s Strategic Bitcoin Reserve!
articles.description: Crypto majors are mostly flat ahead of today’s supreme court opinion on the trump tariffs; btc +1% at $90,300; eth 13% at $3,090, sol +3% at $138; xrp +1% to $2.10. Polygon (+11%), zec (+11%) and syru

articles.title: BNY launches tokenized deposits amid TradFi rush into blockchain and crypto
articles.description: The service is available for institutional clients through an in-house permissioned blockchain, BNY said on Friday.

articles.title: Crypto exchange OKX cuts institutional staff amid global restructuring
articles.description: The exchange has overhauled its institutional business as part of a broader restructuring, with approximately one-third of its sales team exiting, according to one source.

articles.title: Ex-House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, other Democrats back bill to ban elected officials from political prediction market bets
articles.description: Thirty Democrats are rallying behind a bill that would block elected officials from waging politically related bets on prediction markets.

articles.title: Ethereum co-founder reiterates support for Roman Storm, citing privacy
articles.description: The Tornado Cash developer was found guilty of operating an unlicensed transmitter business in August and could still be retried on two counts on which a jury deadlocked.

articles.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Backs Convicted Dev, Calls Privacy 'Essential Protection'
articles.description: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin publicly backed convicted Tornado Cash developer Roman Storm, calling privacy tools a human right.

articles.title: Security expert Bruce Schneier ‘guarantees’ governments are bulk spying with AI
articles.description: From PRISM to AI, mass surveillance has only grown more powerful. Bruce Schneier warns the post-Snowden world may be entering an even darker phase.

articles.title: How Stablecoins Are Rewiring Global Payments | Borderless CPO Alex Garn
Ripple Gets Green Light From FCA to Scale Crypto Payments in the UK
articles.description: Ripple secured regulatory approval to scale its payments business from the UK's Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).

articles.title: Ripple secures FCA authorization, clearing path for UK expansion
articles.description: Ripple has secured approval from the UK’s top financial regulator, clearing the way for an expansion of its platform in the country.

articles.title: Altcoins Defy Bitcoin Slump as XRP, Solana Notch Double-Digit Gains
articles.description: Experts note altcoins’ superior performance compared to Bitcoin is driven by ETF narratives and markets awaiting key U.S. economic data.

articles.title: Bitcoin price clings to $90K as traders eye US Supreme Court tariff ruling
articles.description: Bitcoin traders avoided taking positions amid sideways BTC price action, while markets waited for a decision on US trade tariffs by the Supreme Court.
